trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"> </xref> implementação para que possa utilizar o padrão "serviço de escuta de eventos fracos" para ligar os serviços de escuta para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.
trans-unit.target: Para poder estar escuta neste padrão, os objetos do serviço de escuta tem de implementar <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> on the class that is the source of the events.
trans-unit.target: Não é necessário implementar <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>na classe que é a origem dos eventos.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o processador de eventos especificado, o que é chamado quando a origem especificada gera o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to specify the event handler you want to use to subscribe to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging> event..
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para especificar o processador de eventos que pretende utilizar para subscrever o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging>

trans-unit.source: When you use this method, your listener object does not need to implement the <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> interface.
trans-unit.target: Quando utiliza este método, o objeto de serviço de escuta não necessita de implementar o <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>interface.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que o gera o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que processa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: handler is .
trans-unit.target: handleris .

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified listener to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"></xref> event of the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o serviço de escuta especificado para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos da origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: The object to add as a listener.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a adicionar como um serviço de escuta.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object to contain listeners to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um novo objeto que contém os serviços de escuta para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A new object to contain listeners to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Um novo objeto que contém os serviços de escuta para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Remove o processador de eventos especificado da origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que o gera o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que processa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: handler is .
trans-unit.target: handleris .

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified listener from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"></xref> event of the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Remove o serviço de escuta especificado a partir de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos da origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: The listener to remove.
trans-unit.target: O serviço de escuta para remover.

trans-unit.source: Begins listening for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"></xref> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Começa a escutar o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos na origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: Stops listening for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"></xref> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe a escutar o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView.CurrentChanging"> </xref> eventos na origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.
